text: al mucosa    If cancer is in the buccal mucosa (the lining of the inside of the cheeks), treatment may include the following:          -  Surgery (wide local excision) and/or radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy and radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy before or after surgery.    - A clinical trial of hyperfractionated radiation therapy.
